All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Interface implemented by all the possible actions that a player can do in his turn.
    ActionManager
    Static Class used by the controllers to handle the changings of the Actions of a UserPlayer
    ActionRequest
    Abstract class of message request for requesting the execution of an action
    AdrenalinaException  
    AdrenalinaRuntimeException  
    AdrenalinePrintStream  
    Ammo
    Enumeration representing the Ammo a player can use to pay his actions
    AmmoQuantity  
    AmmoTile
    This class represents an ammo tile.
    AmmoTileParser  
    BoardAlreadyFlippedException  
    BoardFlipDamagedException  
    BoardMaxAmmoException  
    Bot  
    BotAction
    Implementation of the Bot Action considering the possible adrenaline states in which the bot can be
    BotAction.BotState
    Enumeration used to define the state of the Bot's playerboard as his normal or adrenaline actions can be activated
    BotNotSetException  
    BotSpawnRequest
    Message class for requesting the bot spawn
    BotUseRequest
    Message class for requesting an execution of a bot action
    CancelledActionException  
    Card
    Abstract class extended by all the possible kind of cards in the game, that are: WEAPONS, POWERUPS and TILES
    CardAlreadyInHandException  
    CardSquare  
    ChargedWeapon  
    ClassAdrenalinaNotFoundException  
    Cli  
    Client
    This class represents a Client
    ClientGameManager
    Handles the game advancement and listen for the reception of messages
    ClientGameManagerListener
    This listener is used to let the game progress via user inputs.
    ClientMain  
    ClientRMI
    This class represents a RMI Client
    ClientRoundManager
    Owns the game state machine for a client
    ClientRoundManagerException  
    ClientSocket
    This class represents a Socket Client
    ClientUpdateListener
    This interface is used to notify the implementer of an incoming message
    ClientUpdater
    This class run a process that wait messages from the server and notify the Client whenever one arrives
    ColorPickSceneController
    Controller that handles the color pick
    ColorRequest
    Message class for querying which color are free to use
    ColorResponse
    Message class of response to a color request with a list of free colors
    ConfigurationParser  
    Connection
    This interface that represents a connection with a client
    ConnectionRequest
    Message class of connection request
    ConnectionResponse
    Message class of response after a connection request
    ConnectionSceneController
    Controller that handles the connection to the server
    DamageDistributionException  
    Deck
    Class representing a deck of cards, decks contain all same kind of cards
    Direction
    Enumeration representing all the possible directions a player can have in a Square
    DiscardPowerupRequest
    Message class for request a discard of a powerup for spawn
    DisconnectionListener
    this interface need to notify the implementer when the connection with the server is interrupted
    DisconnectionMessage
    Message class for tell the client that a player disconnected
    Effect
    This is the main abstract class from which starts all the Decorator Pattern used to implement the effects of the Weapons and Powerups
    EffectRequest
    Message class for request a effect execution
    EffectRequest.EffectRequestBuilder  
    EffectValidator
    Main utility class used to validate an Effect
    EmptyHandException  
    EndGameSceneController
    Controller of the end game scene
    ExtraDamageDecorator
    Implements the Damage decoration as damages can be distributed to the targets of the Effect Request
    ExtraDamageNoMarkDecorator
    This Class is used to Implement a Mark Decoration without triggering the Marks that the shooter has on his target's playerboard
    ExtraEffectDecorator
    Decorator of the Effect used to add functionalities to a BaseEffect
    ExtraMarkDecorator
    Implements the Mark Decoration as marks can be distributed to the targets of the Effect request
    ExtraMoveDecorator
    Implemets the Move decoration as each movement can be performed
    Game  
    GameAlreadyStartedException  
    GameClientState
    The state of a client, this enumeration is used to reload a game with persistency
    GameConstants  
    GameLoadResponse
    Message class that is sent when a load game is completed successfully
    GameLobby
    This Class handles the players connecting or disconnecting to the game.
    GameManager
    This Class is the Controller that receives Messages, validates them and moves the Game State to make the game evolve
    GameMap
    This class represents the Map used to play the game.
    GameNotReadyException  
    GameSceneController
    Class for the graphical interface of the game
    GameSerialized  
    GameStartMessage
    Message class to tell the clients that the game is started
    GameState
    Enumeration representing the state of the Game, that are the most general states!
    GameStateMessage
    Message class to inform the clients about a game state update
    GameVoteMessage
    Message class for vote a map
    GameVoteResponse
    Message class to respond to a vote map
    Gui  
    GuiManager
    Handles all the interactions between Client and GUI
    IncompatibleActionException  
    InexistentColorException  
    InputValidator  
    InvalidActionException  
    InvalidCommandException  
    InvalidDamageException  
    InvalidGameStateException  
    InvalidKillshotNumberException  
    InvalidMapNumberException  
    InvalidPlayerPositionException  
    InvalidPowerupActionException  
    InvalidPropertiesException  
    InvalidSpawnColorException  
    JsonFileNotFoundException  
    KillShot  
    KillShotsTerminatedException  
    LobbyMessage
    Message class used to join or leave the lobby
    LobbyPlayersResponse
    Message class that is sent when a change is done to the lobby.
    LobbySceneController
    Controller that handles the lobby scene
    LobbyTimer  
    MapInsetsHelper
    Class used to store all the insets for placing elements in the layout
    MapUnknowException  
    MarkDistributionException  
    MaxCardsInHandException  
    MaxPlayerException  
    MaxSquareWeaponsException  
    MenuSceneController  
    Message
    This abstract class need to differentiate that the server can send to the client or vice versa
    MessageBuilder  
    MessageContent
    Enumerations that contains the content of each Message exchanged through the network
    MessageStatus
    Enumeration representing the Status of a Response Message
    MissingCardException  
    MissingPlayerUsernameException  
    MissingWeaponOnSquareException  
    MoveAction
    Implementation of the Move Action considering all the possible kind of moves
    MovePickRequest
    Message class for requesting a move pick action
    MoveRequest
    Message class for requesting a move action
    MoveTarget
    Enumeration used to spread correctly the damage with the Weapons implementation
    MoveTimer  
    NegativeQuantityException  
    NoDirectionException  
    NoFirstPlayerException  
    NotEnoughAmmoException  
    NotEnoughPlayersException  
    NotTransientPlayer  
    NullObjectHelper  
    PassTurnRequest
    Message class for requesting a pass turn
    PersistencyClass  
    PickAction
    Implements the Pick Action considering all the possible kinds of moving actions and the target resource that is going to be picked depending on the moving square
    PingMessage
    Empty message used as a ping message
    PingTimerTask
    This class is a superclass of TimerTask is executed after Client.DISCONNECTION_TIME milliseconds which is scheduled by a Timer, once called notifies the client via a call to DisconnectionListener.onDisconnection()
    Player  
    PlayerBoard  
    PlayerBoardState
    Enumeration representing the states of a PlayerBoard as all her features can be actived correctly.
    PlayerColor
    Enumeration representing all the possible colors that a player can choose to play a game
    PlayerNotFoundException  
    PlayerPoints
    This class represents a player and the points he earned during the game.
    PlayerPosition  
    PositionDistributionException  
    PossibleAction
    Enumeration representing all the possible actions a UserPlayer can have during the game.
    PossibleGameState
    Enumeration containing all the possible states that the GameManager can have while "controlling" the evolving of the game.
    PossiblePlayerState
    Enumeration containing some utility states for the acting player as more particular actions can be handled easier during the game.
    PowerupBaseEffect
    Implements the Class from which each Powerups' effect must be decorated
    PowerupCard
    This class represents a powerup.
    PowerupCardsNotFoundException  
    PowerupParser  
    PowerupRequest
    Message class used for requesting a powerup usage
    PowerupRequest.PowerupRequestBuilder  
    Properties
    Enumeration containing all the possible Properties used to implement the logic of the WeaponCard Weapons.
    ReconnectionMessage
    Message class for game reconnection
    ReloadAction
    Implements the Reload Action that is always executed at the end of the turn of a UserPlayer when the game's state is NORMAL.
    ReloadException  
    ReloadRequest
    Message class for requesting a reload action
    Response
    Generic response to a request
    RMIClientConnection
    This interface is the one sent to the RMI server enabling him to send messages to client
    RMIConnection
    This class represents a RMI Connection with a client
    RMIHandler
    This interface is the one sent to the RMI client enabling him to send messages to server
    RMIHandlerImplementation
    This class is the implementation of the interface RMIHandler
    RMIServer
    This class represents the RMI Server
    RoomColor
    Represents all the possible RoomColors that can appear on the Map
    RoundManager
    This class contains all the methods needed to handle entirely the Round of a player's turn
    SamePositionException  
    SaveGame  
    SemiChargedWeapon  
    Server
    This class is the main server class which starts a Socket and a RMI server.
    ServerAddressValidator  
    ShootAction
    Implements the Shoot Action considering all the possible kind of Shoot that are activated by a player during the game.
    ShootRequest
    Message class for requesting a shoot action execution
    ShootRequest.ShootRequestBuilder  
    SocketConnection
    This class represents a Socket connection with a client
    SocketServer  
    SpawnSquare  
    Square  
    SquareAdjacency
    Enumeration containing all the possible limits of a square.
    SquareType
    Enumeration containing the TWO possible types of a square.
    TableRow
    This class represents a row of the table of EndGameSceneController
    TargetType
    Utility method used to implement the WeaponCards effects as damages and marks can be distributed to each kind of target
    TimerRunListener  
    TurnManager
    This Class is the One that handles the Turn Assignment to a UserPlayer during each phase of the game, using specific parameters when the Turn Assignment does not follow the standard one performed with the method nextTurn
    UnchargedWeapon  
    UnknownPlayerException  
    UsableCard
    This is the real class extended by a usable card as a WEAPON or POWERUP, remember that TILES are always only picked
    UserPlayer  
    UserPlayerState
    Enumeration representing all the possible states that the client round manager can have.
    WeaponAlreadyChargedException  
    WeaponBaseEffect
    Implements the Class from which each Weapons' effect must be decorated
    WeaponCard
    This class represents a Weapon.
    WeaponCardsNotFoundException  
    WeaponChargementException  
    WeaponCostUtility
    This is an Utility class used to manage the payment of a Weapon considering that we can pay both (i) her cost (ii) the cost of her effects
    WeaponNotChargedException  
    WeaponParser  
    WeaponState
    Interface used to manage the state of a Weapon
    WinnersResponse
    This message contains the information about the winners of the game.
